text:
League 1
Nice - Reims: which channel and what time?
For this 12th day of Ligue 1, OGC Nice receives the Stade de Reims this Sunday, November 3rd. A meeting to follow in full and live on French television. At what time and on which channel? Answer in this article.
03 Nov 2019, 04:30 by Hugo Deloraine



Top 15 under-21s most expensive! Discover in pictures the 15 highest market values of players under 21 years old.IconSport



15 Declan RiceClub: West Ham Age: 20 yearsValue: 39M â‚¬ Position: middleIconSport



14 Phil FodenClub: Manchester City Age: 19 yearsValue: 40,8M â‚¬ Position: strikerIconSport



13 Houssem AouarClub: Olympique LyonnaisAge: 21 yearsValue: 41.6M â‚¬ Position: middleIconSport



12 MattÃ©o GuendouziClub: ArsenalAge: 20 yearsValue: 42,8M â‚¬ Position: middleIconSport



11 Nicolo ZanioloClub: AS RomeAge: 20 yearsValue: 45.3M â‚¬ Position: forwardingIconSport



10 Eder MilitaoClub: Real MadridAge: 21 years oldValue: 54.6M â‚¬ Position: defenderIconSport



9 Christian PulisicClub: ChelseaAge: 20 yearsValue: 57.2M â‚¬ Position: forwardingIconSport



8 Vinicius JuniorClub: Real MadridAge: 18 yearsValue: 60.2M â‚¬ Position: forwardingIconSport



7 Gianluigi DonnarummaClub: AC MilanAge: 20 yearsValue: 67.9M â‚¬ Position: goalkeeperIconSport



6 Joao FÃ©lix Club: Atletico MadridAge: 19 years oldValue: 71.8M â‚¬ Position: forwardingIconSport



5 Trent Alexander-ArnoldClub: LiverpoolAge: 20 yearsValue: 73.6M â‚¬ Position: defenderIconSport



4 Kai HavertzClub: Bayer LeverkusenAge: 20 yearsValue: 74.2M â‚¬ Position: offensive midfielderIconSport



3 Matthijs de LigtClub: Ajax AmsterdamAge: 19 years oldValue: â‚¬ 74.5M Position: defenderIconSport



2 Jadon SanchoClub: Borussia DortmundAge: 19 years oldValue: â‚¬ 120.3M Position: strikerIconSport



1 Kylian MbappÃ©Club: Paris Saint-GermainAge: 20 yearsValue: 261.6M â‚¬ Position: forwardingIconSport

Top 15 Most Under-21 Players




Eliminated by Le Mans in the Coupe de la Ligue last Wednesday (3-2 loss), OGC Nice will be keen to catch up with the Stade de Reims, author of a very good start to the season and current fourth in Ligue 1 This match will count for the twelfth day of the French championship. The meeting will take place at the Allianz Riviera in Nice.







At what time and on which channel?




David Guion, coach of Reims + 16 ğŸ“·Credit Photo - Icon Sport

The match between Nice and Reims is broadcast live on television on Bein Sports 1 this Sunday, November 3rd. The kickoff will be given at 17h.
